column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////Thank you for bringing this to our attention
column2: Sue. We are sorry to hear about your disappointing experience with the food you received while dining in with us. Please click the link to fill out the corresponding information and our safety team will be in contact with you more directly. Again
column3: thank you for your feedback and we greatly appreciate you bringing it to our attention. We are looking forward to hearing from you.
